responses.dialog: I don't really have any food on me.
<< Pretend you don't hear or see anything. >>

dialog: There's a food stand over there, just saying..

responses.dialog: I don't have a lot of cash, but I can see if they have a hot dog or something...

dialog: Really? I haven't had anything to eat in two days, and I'm starting to see spots in my vision, I got kicked out a couple days ago and I don't know how to get anything for free... I already tried to steal from the guy selling food over there and now he knows what I look like... It means a lot...
